name: find-meow
description: 앱인토스(Apps in Toss) 미니앱 - TV 채널 고양이 찾기 게임

scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path dist)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force dist }; Copy-Item index.html, styles.css, result-layout-patch.css -Destination dist -Force; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force images, point, audio -Destination dist"

author: CODA Creative
